plot outline: This is a story of two gangsters, Vishnu (Vishnuvardhan) and Shankar (Shankar Nag), who keep on fighting with each other. Vishnu and his gang members are close to Parvathajji (Jayanthi), a widowed villager who is taking care of two orphan kids, Raja (Master Manjunath) and his sister. Election starts and both the gangs are working for their respective parties. Parvathajji wants to go back to her village with the kids and Vishnu promises to take her to the village after the Election. Will Vishnu be able to keep his promise? What about these orphan kids?">This is a story of two gangsters, Vishnu (Vishnuvardhan) and Shankar (Shankar Nag), who keep on fighting with each other. Vishnu and his gang members are close to Parvathajji (Jayanthi), a widowed villager who is taking care of two orphan kids, Raja (Master Manjunath) and his sister. Election starts and both the gangs are working for their respective parties. Parvathajji wants to go back to her village with the kids and Vishnu promises to take.
